Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.ui.interfaces

Interface UIController

public interface UIController

This interface describes UI controller. UI controller is used to control auto-built GUI entities. Class implemented this interface, will be called after calling appropriative FormManager methods. To exclude implementation dependencies, all methods of this interface make control by returning implementation-independent commands. Syntax of these commands is:

  • disable <fieldName>,...
  • enable <fieldName>,...
  • immutable <fieldName>,...
  • mutable <fieldName>,...
  • invisible <fieldName>,...
  • visible <fieldName>,...
  • nonfocusable <fieldName>,...
  • focusable <fieldName>,...

One or more commands in returned string must be separated with semicolon (;). Unparsed commands in the string are ignored without any notices, unknown fields throws exceptions

Since:
0.0.4
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String afterAction​(ContentMetadataInterface.ContentNodeMetadata node, java.lang.String action, RefreshMode mode)
    This method is called after calling ActionFormManager.onAction(Object, Object, String, Object) method.
    java.lang.String afterField​(ContentMetadataInterface.ContentNodeMetadata node, java.lang.String fieldName, RefreshMode mode)
    This method is called after calling FieldFormManager.onField(Object, Object, String, Object) method.
    java.lang.String afterRecord​(ContentMetadataInterface.ContentNodeMetadata node, RecordFormManager.Action action, RefreshMode mode)
    This method is called after calling RecordFormManager.onRecord(RecordFormManager.Action, Object, Object, Object, Object) method.
    java.lang.String before​(ContentMetadataInterface.ContentNodeMetadata node)
    This method is called before showing any controls on the screen

  • Method Details

    • before

      java.lang.String before​(ContentMetadataInterface.ContentNodeMetadata node)

      This method is called before showing any controls on the screen

      Parameters:
      node - root metadata associated with UI form
      Returns:
      command string as described in the class description. Can be null

    • afterField

      java.lang.String afterField​(ContentMetadataInterface.ContentNodeMetadata node, java.lang.String fieldName, RefreshMode mode)

      This method is called after calling FieldFormManager.onField(Object, Object, String, Object) method.

      Parameters:
      node - root metadata for the controlled instance (the same first parameter in the FieldFormManager.onField(Object, Object, String, Object) call)
      fieldName - field name passed (third parameter in the FieldFormManager.onField(Object, Object, String, Object) call)
      mode - value returned by FieldFormManager.onField(Object, Object, String, Object) call
      Returns:
      command string as described in the class description. Can be null

    • afterRecord

      java.lang.String afterRecord​(ContentMetadataInterface.ContentNodeMetadata node, RecordFormManager.Action action, RefreshMode mode)

      This method is called after calling RecordFormManager.onRecord(RecordFormManager.Action, Object, Object, Object, Object) method.

      Parameters:
      node - root metadata for the controlled instance (second or forth parameter in the RecordFormManager.onRecord(RecordFormManager.Action, Object, Object, Object, Object) call - dependent on action parameter)
      action - action passed to RecordFormManager.onRecord(RecordFormManager.Action, Object, Object, Object, Object) call
      mode - value returned by RecordFormManager.onRecord(RecordFormManager.Action, Object, Object, Object, Object) call
      Returns:
      command string as described in the class description. Can be null

    • afterAction

      java.lang.String afterAction​(ContentMetadataInterface.ContentNodeMetadata node, java.lang.String action, RefreshMode mode)

      This method is called after calling ActionFormManager.onAction(Object, Object, String, Object) method.

      Parameters:
      node - root metadata for the controlled instance (the same first parameter in the ActionFormManager.onAction(Object, Object, String, Object) call)
      action - action passed (third parameter in the ActionFormManager.onAction(Object, Object, String, Object) call)
      mode - value returned by ActionFormManager.onAction(Object, Object, String, Object) call
      Returns:
      command string as described in the class description. Can be null
